description: Adds or updates services and authorized targets to configure what the Amazon QuickSight IAM Identity Center application can access. This operation is only supported for Amazon QuickSight accounts using IAM Identity Center.

parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that contains the identity propagation configuration that you want to update.

parameters.name: Service
parameters.description: The name of the Amazon Web Services service that contains the authorized targets that you want to add or update.

parameters.name: AuthorizedTargets
parameters.description: Specifies a list of application ARNs that represent the authorized targets for a service. (string) ---

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.
